datafield.subfield: Muzeĭ arkheologii i ėtnografii Sibiri im. V.M. Florinskogo
Tomskiĭ gosudarstvennyĭ universitet imeni V.V. Kuĭbysheva.
Does not appear to be an official name change between Muzeĭ arkheologii i ėtnografii Sibiri im. V.M. Florinskogo and Muzei︠a︡ arkheologii i ėtnografii Sibiri.
Trudy Muzei︠a︡ arkheologii i ėtnografii Sibiri im. V.M. Florinskogo Tomskogo gosudarstvennogo universiteta, 2002:
t.p. (... Muzei︠a︡ arkheologii i ėtnografii Sibiri im. V.M. Florinskogo Tomskogo gosudarstvennogo universiteta) t.p. verso (founded 1882) spine (MAĖS TGU)
Trudy Muzei︠a︡ arkheologii i ėtnografii Sibiri im. V.M. Florinskogo Tomskogo gosudarstvennogo universiteta, 2013:
title page (Muzei︠a︡ arkheologii i ėtnografii Sibiri)
Tomskiĭ gosudarstvennyĭ universitet WWW site, viewed November 14, 2014

at head of page (Muzei︠a︡ arkheologii i ėtnografii Sibiri) in text of page (Muzeĭ arkheologii i ėtnografii Sibiri im. V.M. Florinskogo; founded 1882 by V.M. Florinskīĭ; in 2003 issued a series Trudy MAES im. V.M. Florinskogo TGU;

Its Katalog ėtnograficheskikh kollekt︠s︡iĭ Muzei︠a︡arkheologii i ėtnografii Sibiri Tomskogo universiteta, 1979: v. 1, t.p. (Muzei︠a︡ arkheologii i ėtnografii Sibiri Tomskogo universiteta) p. 4 (founded 1882 by V. M. Florinskiĭ; 1923-1934 was called ėtnologo-arkheologicheskiĭ, in 1934 was renamed Muzeĭ istorii materialʹnoĭ kulʹtury [no pubs. in L.C.] in 1968 became part of University's Problemnai︠a︡ nauchno-issledovatelʹskai︠a︡ laboratorii︠a︡ istorii, arkheologii i ėtnografii Sibiri, changing its name to Muzeĭ arkheologii i ėtnografii Sibiri Tomskogo gosudarstvennogo universiteta) p. 11 (ref. in earliest catalog as Arkheologicheskiĭ muzeĭ Tomskogo universiteta)
